meanings.definition: Inclined to forget; having a poor memory.
meanings.sent1: She is very forgetful and often misplaces her keys.
meanings.sent2: The forgetful student forgot to study for the test.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful professor accidentally wore mismatched socks to class.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a forgetful old library, full of lost memories.
meanings.sent5: The forgetful old man wandered the streets, unsure of where he was going.
